version.title: [PATCH] undefined method `assert_emails' for old_base/mail_service_test.rb

version.body: This test doesn't run anymore on actionmailer, but doing ruby old_base/mail_service_test.rb i'm still getting that error.
version.body-html: This test doesn't run anymore on actionmailer, but doing ruby old_base/mail_service_test.rb i'm still getting that error.
